page.title: 12Eyton-on-the-Wealdmoors
page.content: Eyton is a small village just outside Wellington .There is no bus service or post office now.The children in Eyton go to Dothill school because there is no{school}in Eyton.It was closed in 1958.The largest house in Eyton is {Eyton hall}which belongs to Mr.and Mrs.Murphy.Surrounding Eyton hall there is some parkland with some patches of woodland.There are 22 rooms in Eyton hall.The Murphys have lived in Eyton for 30 years,and they own 32 acres of land.They are hoping to use the hall as a restaurant for private parties.There is no new housing in Eyton,apart from the village hall, built 18-20 years ago.The population of Eyton is 45 people.Eyton house{farm}belongs to Mr. and Mrs. Udale.Eyton farm covers over 1,700 acres.The main crops are wheat,barley,potatoes and sugar beet.
